thread.title: Andy & Barbara
thread.title_full: Woodland Direct reviewed by Andy & Barbara

author: Andy & Barbara
title: Andy & Barbara
text: My husband & I have ordered from Woodland Direct previously. Some items we loved and some...well, not so much...but the company was accommodating and accepted our return, amended their on-line description and all is well; stated made in U.S.A. and was not! We our optimistic about our new purchases and as stated in the title, the site is extremely easy to navigate.
